Instruction: Grate cauliflower florets or pulse in a food processor until they have a rice-like texture.
Microwave on high for 4 to 5 minutes, or until tender.
Stir cooked cauliflower into the bean mixture. Add cheese and stir until melted.
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, heat olive oil. Add ground beef and cook until well browned, about 5 minutes, breaking it apart with a spoon as it cooks.
